EmailTemplate.name: 201907_APAC_Event_HOC_KualaLumpur_Xiamen_MC.201910_APAC_Thank_You_HOC_KualaLumpu
EmailTemplate.subject: THANK YOU! from Honeywell
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear Customer, Thank you for your attendance at our recently conducted 2019 Honeywell Operator Conference events; held in both Kuala Lumpur Malaysia, and Xiamen China. It was a pleasure connecting with you at the conference, and hearing how energized you are about the company’s technical information and product updates. Stay in the loop with us and you’ll be among the first to learn about the latest in lighting, weather radar, actuation products, and more. Please click below to sign up, so you can get all your aircraft up-to-speed.
CLICK HERE TO SIGN UP <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/forms/subscription-page]]>
